description.narrative: WaterAid is supporting the provision of water, sanitation and hygiene education in two rural municipalities or communes (Tsinjoarivo Imanga and Bevato) in Tsiroanomandidy District, in the Bongolava region of Madagascar. Between 2015 and 2018 we will reach 35,404 people with safe water, and 8,870 people with improved latrines and hygiene.

participating-org.narrative: Plateforme de Fédération des Personnes Handicapées
